CustomField.formula: IF($RecordType.Name = "OE Complex","OEM + Prod ID", CASE(Type_of_Opportunity__c, "R&O - Components","R&O + Prod ID", "R&O - APU","R&O + Prod ID", "R&O - Wheels and Brakes","R&O + Prod ID", "Spares - LRUs","LRU + Prod ID", "RMUs - Avionics","RMU CA + Prod ID", "RMUs - Mechanical Upgrades","RMU CA + Prod ID", "Error"))
CustomField.label: SIP ItemCode
